summary: New building in Karthwasten aimed for users of Guild Starter. With everything a guild would need.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][u][b]General Information[/b][/u][/size]
[size=4]A new building located in the center of Karthwasten. This building can serve as a player home, a resting point, and a headquarters for those who have and use Guild Starter. This building has no load doors and has all the amenities of a player home and/ or guild headquarters. Also there is a new armor in the building as good a scaled armor. The armor is fully temper able.[/size]
[u]
[b][size=6][center]What it has:[/center][/size][/b][/u]
[center][size=3]Alchemy Lab[/size]
[size=3]Enchanting Table[/size]
[size=3]Forever lasting campfire for Frostfall users.[/size]
[size=3]Forge[/size]
[size=3]Grindstone[/size]
[size=3]Tanning Rack[/size]
[size=3]Workbench[/size]
[size=3]Karthwasten Armor Set[/size]
[size=3]A double hay bed[/size]
[size=3]Five Bedrolls (For fellow guild members if you have Guild Starter)[/size]
[size=3]Unique player home with no loading doors[/size]
[size=3]A cooking split[/size]
[size=3]A nice balcony with a great view[/size]
[size=3]A no reset chest to dump all your gear in
A smelter nearby[/size][/center]

[size=6][b][u][center]Best Played with Guild Starter:[/center]
[/u][/b][/size][center][size=3]As a headquarters for yourÂ guild mates[/size]
[size=3]Has plenty of beds for your guild mates[/size]
[size=3]Does not count as an interior location so guild mates can easily find there way there[/size]
[/center]
[size=6][b][u][center]Without Guild Starter:[/center][/u][/b][/size]
[size=3][center]The hideout still can be a player home for just yourself and maybe a follower
Has every kind of vanilla crafting stations so it can act as maybe a GEAR UPGRADING POST
The beds aren't owned so if your tired you can pick any bed to fall in[/center][/size]
[b][u][size=6][center]Compatibility:[/center][/size][/u][/b][/font][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]It might have clipping issues if o[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]ther Karthwasten building additions are used[/size][/font][/center]
author: Yizzernaut
